name: Letters (DevNost)
description:
Hey,

find all the letters that are randomly distributed over the map, meanwhile you will be chased! The more notes, the more exciting and thrilling it becomes. Have fun :)

__________________

Info:

this is my third game i ever programmed myself :). I just wanted to publish it to get some feedback.  

I just developed this for fun over a weekend. That's why there are still some animations or features missing. For now the game is paused and I won't develop it further. Since I am currently working on a new game.

If you have bugs or suggestions you can still post them, I will try to fix them or add features.

For questions feel free to come on my Discord and write me personally (maxp@devnost.com) :)
